mapper.insert: INSERT INTO META_COL_INFO ( TBL_ID, COL_SQNO, DSET_ID, COL_ENG_NM, COL_KOREAN_NM, COL_DESCR, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_FORMAT, NN_YN, PK_INFO, FK_INFO, CTRL_COND, PRVC_YN, ENCPT_YN, PRVT_YN ) VALUES ( #{tblId}, #{colSqno}, #{dsetId}, #{colEngNm}, #{colKoreanNm}, #{colDescr}, #{dataType}, #{dataLen}, #{dataFormat}, #{nnYn}, #{pkInfo}, #{fkInfo}, #{ctrlCond}, #{prvcYn}, #{encptYn}, #{prvtYn} )
mapper.select: SELECT MCI.TBL_ID, MCI.COL_SQNO, MCI.DSET_ID, MCI.COL_ENG_NM, MCI.COL_KOREAN_NM, MCI.COL_DESCR, MCI.DATA_TYPE, MCI.DATA_LEN, MCI.DATA_FORMAT, MCI.NN_YN, MCI.PK_INFO, MCI.FK_INFO, MCI.CTRL_COND, MCI.PRVC_YN, MCI.ENCPT_YN, MCI.PRVT_YN FROM META_COL_INFO MCI WHERE MCI.TBL_ID = #{tblId}
mapper.update: UPDATE META_COL_INFO SET COL_ENG_NM = #{colEngNm}, COL_KOREAN_NM = #{colKoreanNm}, COL_DESCR = #{colDescr}, DATA_TYPE = #{dataType}, DATA_LEN = #{dataLen}, DATA_FORMAT = #{dataFormat}, NN_YN = #{nnYn}, PK_INFO = #{pkInfo}, FK_INFO = #{fkInfo}, CTRL_COND = #{ctrlCond}, PRVC_YN = #{prvcYn}, ENCPT_YN = #{encptYn}, PRVT_YN = #{prvtYn} WHERE TBL_ID = #{tblId} AND COL_SQNO = #{colSqno} AND DSET_ID = #{dsetId}
